tidbits.title: Smallest Country
tidbits.description: Vatican City is the smallest independent state in the world, both in size and population, housing significant religious and cultural landmarks.

tidbits.title: Spiritual Center
tidbits.description: As the spiritual center of the Roman Catholic Church, Vatican City is home to St. Peter's Basilica, the Sistine Chapel, and the Vatican Museums.

tidbits.title: Cultural Treasures
tidbits.description: The city boasts a wealth of art, including masterpieces by Michelangelo, Raphael, and other renowned artists, making it a destination for art and history enthusiasts.
